label: 太政官
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: This great council of state was the main administrative body of the imperial government according to the Ritsuryō system, and included figures and agencies including the prime minister; great ministers of the left, right and center; major, middle, and lesser counsellors; the controlling boards of the left and right; major, middle, and minor controllors of the left and right; secretaries, recorders, scribes, office administrators; as well as the ministers overseeing the 8 ministries of central affairs, ceremony, civil administration, popular affairs, military affairs, justice, treasury, and the imperial household.
